title: Divine Vine Bangles - Kanganam
materials: meticulously crafted with a Hyderabadi polish to enhance its luster. Adorned with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
offering the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price point. The gold has a rich
warm tone that complements the sparkle of the CZ stones.
features: These bangles feature a delicate vine design, with intricately detailed leaves crafted from gold. The CZ stones are set in a channel setting, allowing maximum light reflection and creating a continuous line of sparkle. The design blends traditional motifs with a modern aesthetic. Includes a secure clasp for ease of wear and removal.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold and Sparkling Clear White CZ stones.
occasions: and special events. These bangles can also be gifted during weddings
or anniversaries. Great for a half-saree function (Langa Voni function).
description: These bangles are a beautiful fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The high-quality gold and brilliant CZ stones provide a luxurious look and feel without the hefty price tag. The vine design symbolizes growth and prosperity, making it a meaningful gift. Crafted with the renowned Hyderabadi polish, ensuring long-lasting shine and durability. An affordable luxury that doesn't compromise on style or quality.
